name: BrickBreaker (hk4213)
description:
Traditional Brick Breaker with my own visual twist. 

Built over the course of 4 days as a test to see how much I have learned over the last several months. Independent animations for the background, borders and menus all made with assets that you get with unity by default with the exception of music.  Bricks repopulate after they are all destroyed so you can keep going until you run out of lives. Enjoy!!!

Controls:

Move paddle left and right with A, D or Left Arrow Key and Right Arrow Key. 

Launch the ball with space. If it get stuck moving directly up and down or left and right press space again to correct course.
